title: Lyric Theatre of Oklahoma – Summer 2026 Season
description: Lyric Theatre of Oklahoma is casting its 2026 summer season, which includes Annie, Sister Act, and Sweeney Todd. The company works under AEA URTA and Guest Artist agreements; both union and non-union performers are cast. Lyric considers actors of all backgrounds and genders. Auditions are accompanied; see the official auditions page for requirements and sign-up.
filmingDates: Season runs summer 2026. Exact rehearsal and performance dates are on Lyric’s auditions page.
submissionDetails: Sign-up links and categories (adult singer/dancer, apprentice, youth) are on Lyric’s auditions page. Prepare two contrasting songs in the style of the season; bring sheet music. Bring one 8×10 headshot and resume (trimmed and stapled back to back). Video submissions and all casting questions: CastingCoordinator@LyricTheatreOKC.org. Full instructions and character breakdowns: see link below.

roles.description: Principal season roles. Auditions Feb 21–26, 2026; callbacks Feb 28–March 1. Rehearsals Tue–Sun. See Lyric’s page for breakdown and sides.
Apprentice track. Kids and apprentice auditions Sun Feb 22, 2026 at 1pm. Sign up via Lyric’s auditions page.
Female-presenting singers 18+ for Sister Act. Auditions Feb 27, 2026. Specific material and sign-up on Lyric’s page. In-person only; no video submissions for this track.
